fullText:
Religious Dabbler

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Half-elf, any divine class
Benefit: Choose a 1st-level at-will attack power from a divine class other than your own. From now on, you can use either that power or the power you gained from your Dilettante racial trait as an encounter power (but you can’t use both in the same encounter).

Published in Divine Power, page(s) 136.
name: Religious Dabbler
